# Sample .env file for testing
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values

# Google Places API Configuration
GOOGLE_PLACES_API_KEY=test_api_key_123456789
GOOGLE_PLACES_API_COST_PER_CALL=0.032

# Notion API Configuration
NOTION_API_KEY=secret_test1234567890abcdef
NOTION_DATABASE_ID=12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc

# Retry Configuration
MAX_RETRIES=5
RETRY_BACKOFF_BASE=1

# Logging Configuration
LOG_LEVEL=INFO
LOG_FILE=app.log

# Cache Configuration
CACHE_MAX_SIZE=1000
CACHE_MAX_MEMORY_MB=10

# Application Configuration
APP_NAME=US Vet Scraping
APP_VERSION=1.0.0
